item.title: Does Ram have an obsession with summer glau?
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
No, apparently I have a weird taste when it comes to women. And Rihanna irritates me both visually and aurally. It’s by far one of the must repulsive female creatures on this planet (to me, at least). She has a face to piss on, she can’t sing for shit, her videos are the epitome of bad taste and she just sounds like an extremely dumb human being.

Though, as I said before, I would turn gay for some men. One being J Mascis. The other being Willem Dafoe.

item.source: Does Ram have an obsession with summer glau?

item.title: Does Ram have an obsession with summer glau?
item.dc:creator: gugamilare
item.description:
Let me fall into this conversation with a parachute

Burbinator:

To be honest, there’s a big difference between hot and pretty, or beautiful.
They rarely go together as far as I’m concerned.
Someone who’s pretty and beautiful is much more attractive, I think. Someone who’s hot may be good to get your rocks of or something, but other than that…

I also separate women’s characteristics that way, but a little bit more. There are hot women, which have a good appearance (body and face, good just to… you know… look at ), there are beautiful or pretty women, and there are attractive women. The latter concept involves much more than just appearance: it includes smartness, matureness, sensitivity, sympathy and perhaps even qualities that don’t have a name. Beauty is something in-between.

I prefer a beautiful girl like a thousand times over a hot one, likewise an attractive over a pretty one. A conversation, for instance, is much more interesting with an attractive women.

Bolteh:

And you can say what you want, in a lot of cases, you can actually tell by pictures that a person has a certain personality.

DansonDelta40:

Although you probably don’t know - not from the pictures you apparently prefer.

I believe that, when you see a person (either man or woman) you end up perceiving a lot more than you think. It is like an automatic evaluation made by your own brain, and I have no clue how it works, but it surely depends on her personality and on yours.

There are girls that I look at for the first time or talk to just for two minutes and find so much attractive. I tried to understand why such girls attract me so much, but I got no luck. Maybe if I had notions in psychology? One common denominator I found is that those girls are generally smarter than the average once I get to know them.

On the other side, there are hot girls which I look and I don’t find her attractive at all. And generally, knowing them better, they might even be cool people, but they are not that smart or might have other problems that make me not find them attractive.

Well, that is what happens on the average. I guess I can’t tell how many times it works to judge a person just by some pictures, it can work out or not, but I bet you can make a pretty good judgment of a person just seeing a video with he or she talking or singing.

Oh! And some pictures for the party (Sorry, no high-res pics):

468×596 36.5 KB

399×600 53.8 KB

I find her very beautiful, and more or less attractive, but not that much. I might have a healthy (before tiki-dog asks ) obsession by her. Well, in case you wonder, there are very few girls that I find attractive

P.S.: I don’t know most of the girls you guys posted here, except Rihanna, which I know very little and don’t like at all, but she is hot.

P.P.S.: Hell! tiki-dog was banned! What the hell did he do? Was it because of this thread? His comments here were so funny, what a shame…

Read full topic

item.title: Does Ram have an obsession with summer glau?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
DansonDelta40:

You know - there are other facial expressions for women on photographs besides pouting and/or licking lips and lasciviously flirting with the camera, throwin’ an almost desperate “fuck me” stare at the viewer and keeping mouth and eyes half opened as if in the middle of a coitus.

Although you probably don’t know - not from the pictures you apparently prefer.

Yeah I know all their natural expressions but she’s trying to look hot in that pic and failing miserably.
